WorkItem.Description: since .9 it seems for some odd reason that Haste is not being calc properly, anything with haste seems to be calcualting to SLOW my DPS, the more haste, the worse the DPS.  any trinket or other item, that I select with haste on it is minus to DPS.

Comments.Message:
I cannot reproduce it in 2.3.10 with your character profile.

If you look at "Slot: Relative Stat Values" graph you'll see:
Strength 1,24
Expertise Rating 0,72
Crit Rating 0,69
Agility 0,59
Attack Power 0,54
Haste Rating 0,44
Armor Penetration Rating 0,35
Spell Power 0,24
Hit Rating 0,21
Intellect 0,00

Haste is not near the top but it's only 3 times lower than Strength and only 36% lower than crit.

If you change your hit trinket for Herkuml War Token, for example, you'll see both total dps and white dps increase.

ok, I must just be on the edge of some caps then, 'loseing' any hit for haste is a bad trade off right now then.
I will try some other things then. thanks for the assist.
